Die SHD hat sich als herstellerunabhängiges Systemhaus auf IT-Dienstleistungen fokussiert. Die SHD bietet IT-Lösungen, wie Basis-Infrastruktur, Collaboration, Storage…

Backend Developer (m/f)
results.description: bitpanda is Europe’s leading digital asset platform (e.g. Bitcoin, Ethereum & co) and one of the fastest growing FinTechs. We have the vision of creating an eco-system that allows a simple entry for beginners and an optimised usability for the advanced users. For this, we constantly work on new innovations and see ourselves as pioneers for the future financial and payment industry. To achieve our visions of the future, we work closely with financial services, banks and several trading platforms…
